text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump These great medical people are mopping up YOUR mess! If you didn't ignore U.S. intel's repeated warnings about the seriousness of COVID19, as far back as Nov 2019, the medical community wouldn't BE in this position right now. https://t.co/YYPZoewJH1
